coreAttributes.name: "Love is Blue" gun
coreAttributes.description: The guns have a strange magic emitting from it. They feel like they came from a foreign dimension. You don't know why, but you think they had a greater purpose. In this world, though, that purpose is lost for now.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Shoot [npc2.name] with the "Love is Blue" guns.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(attach)] the guns to [npc.her] heels, before holding a gun in [npc.her] hands, ready to fire upon [npc.her] enemies.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.name] [npc.verb(take)] off the guns on {npc.her] heels, and putting the guns away.
